article: All students should have good study habits . When you have good study habits , you can learn things quickly . You also remember them easily . Do you like to study in the living - room ? This is not a good place because it is usually too noisy . You should study in a quiet place , like your bedroom . A quiet place will help you only think about one thing , and you will learn better . Before you begin to study , do not forget to clean your desk . A good desk light is important , too . You ' ll feel tired easily if there is not much light .
questions: The best title of this passage is

model: how to study in the reading room
